sentence: (WHTM) — Dave McCormick, who is running for United States Senate in Pennsylvania, continues his campaign in York and Lancaster on Monday, Feb. 28.

sentence: DAUPHIN COUNTY, Pa. (WHTM) — Dave McCormick, candidate for Pennsylvania’s open seat in the United States Senate, is making his way to campaign in Dauphin County on Friday, March 11.

title: Senate candidate Dave McCormick to visit Dauphin County

sentence: A recent Fox News poll found Bartos with 9% support from Pennsylvanian Republican voters, tying him with Kathy Barnette for third behind Dave McCormick and Dr. Mehmet Oz.

title: Pa. Senate candidate Jeff Bartos reaches petition requirement

sentence: HUMMELSTOWN, Pa. (WHTM) — Republican Senate Candidate Dave McCormick made a local campaign stop on Friday, March 11.

sentence: In a race expected to help determine the balance of power in the Senate, former hedge fund CEO Dave McCormick and celebrity physician Mehmet Oz are at the top of the polls.

title: 4 things to watch for in the Pennsylvania GOP Senate Debate

sentence: Kathy Barnette, Jeff Bartos, Dave McCormick, Mehmet Oz, and Carla Sands will appear in the Pennsylvania Republican U.S. Senate debate on April 25 at 8 p.m. in a one-hour prime-time event airing in every market in the commonwealth.

title: Pennsylvania Senate Race Debate: Republican candidates face-off
